metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44488 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
VP9 in libvpx before 1.13.1 mishandles widths, leading to a crash related to encoding.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44488` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx7 - 1.12.0-1ubuntu2
vpx-tools - 1.12.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
libvpx package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '1.12.0-1ubuntu2').
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
